greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 4; a(2) = 3; a(3) = 1; for n > 3, a(n) = a(n-1)-(n-1) if this is positive and has not already appeared in the sequence, otherwise a(n) = a(n-1)+(n-1).
link: Index entries for sequences related to Recamán's sequence
xref: A variant of A005132. A row of the array in A066202.
